name: 〇〇〇
description:
Pop 3 bubbles of the same color in a row by moving the tray with arrows.

#Low Effort Jam 22
Done with only a 50ko/s internet available... First time I don't use google or stackoverflow to make a game. :)

I used a simplified version of the physical engine made for my CS50 final project and tried to do a real little game with it. (or hope so)

Sound effects reused from my previous games, they were adapted from recordings in LaSonothèque of Joseph Sardin (Free of right)

Source code (in French)
